data.title: Ran K Country (Or Dependent Territory) Populatio N Date % of World Populatio N Source
data.meta_description: World Population - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document lists the top 125 countries by population according to various data sources. It provides each country's rank, name, population total and date, population percentage of the world total, and source for the population data. The world population is listed as 7.15 billion as of April 2014, with China and India having the top two populations of over 1.3 billion and 1.2 billion people respectively.
